clues.text: In Washington State a charge of this in the second degree is coming if, with criminal negligence, you cause a person's death

clues.text: A numerical way of saying half favorable, half unfavorable

1833: Anselme Payen discovers diastase, aka amylase, the first of these proteins that catalyze chemical reactions

rounds.text: In 1804 an officer of HMS Warrior formally charged this captain with "calling me rascal, scoundrel & shaking his fist in my face"
